We champion our clients and specialise in visually elevating your brand to amplify your business.

Introduction

Oakland Agency was brought to life with the intention to connect brands with their consumers through creative and savvy social media strategies.

We champion our clients by specialising in visually elevating our partners to amplify their brands, resulting in a positive impact on their broader business objectives.

Strong relationships merged with enviable creative direction has become Oakland Agency's trademark.

Services

Influencer marketing

We have strong relationships with macro and micro influencers in Australasia and know how important match-making can be. Trust us to get the chemistry right between your brand and the ambassadors.

Social Media Strategy

Oakland Agency can assist defining your brand, business, and digital marketing goals. Then we will customise a plan to reach these, and amplify your brand presence, and with that - your bottom line.

Social media management

Don’t like sliding in your DM’s? We do! Ensuring prompt replies, scheduling, and strategy to nurture your community, build trust, amplify your messaging, and keep that engagement strong.

Story Telling

We believe in the power of community. What are you doing to build, and nurture yours? Story telling is all about combining our Content Creation service with meaningful and engaging stories. This is about building your brand and nourishing your community with stories that your customers will connect with.

Content creation

The digital world is oversaturated. Creating something that is both beautiful and engaging is key. We offer solutions tailored to your business needs, timeframe, and budget. For large scale campaign shoots, we have an impressive black book of creative contacts - Ensuring you get the best of our collective expertise.

Art Direction

We will elevate your brand visuals and take it to the next level. Including campaign concepts, design and production. Just quietly this is one of our ace cards. Let us bring your brand to life. You know, visually speaking.

TESTIMONIALS

We have been working with Oakland Agency on all things social since the launch of BraveFace and couldn’t be happier. They understand the importance of getting a mix of influencers who not only convert sales but align with our brand messaging. Mandy is so well connected in the industry and knows exactly which influencers to work with to achieve the desired results of the campaign. Because of her relationships we often find we get added extras outside of the agreed deliverables.

She has an amazing creative eye and has styled shoots, helped us with grid planning and organised beautifully thought out send outs. Our social strategy has been a key part of our success in scaling the brand. We are now upping our game on social with our other brand Clinicians. We have partnered with Oakland to manage our influencer outreach and send outs and are getting great traction.

Katherine Douglas
BraveFace & Clinicians
